title: New beginnings
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode number 6 of Series "The Animals of Farthing Wood". After all he has been through, it seems that Bold must return to White Deer Park a failure. Badly injured after being shot, Bold lived the life of a shabby city fox, scavenging for scraps. Nevertheless, he managed to find some happiness with the young vixen Whisper. Whisper is determined to return to White Deer Park, so that the cubs she is expecting can be born within the circle of their Farthing Wood family still under the leadership of Bold's famous father Fox. For the sake of his cubs, Bold agrees to make the long and dangerous journey home. Meanwhile, Scarface has vowed to kill all the Farthing Wood animals "one by one". This is the ultimate test to Fox's leadership. Based on the novel by Colin Dann.
related_objects: Series; S01127; The Animals of Farthing Wood; Active; 1992
